problemId:
• Scalability problem of Ethereum blockchain.
• Transaction fee(GAS) mechanism of Ethereum blockchain.
scaleId:
• The "Stamina" is the best utility of the PNT. It makes the transaction fee mechanism more useful for end-users than the current Ethereum blockchain.
• Operators could make a rational mining revenue proportionally to their plasma network scale.
economyId:
• The Plasma network economy is driven by a network effect of the plamsa chain.
• Once PNT deposited into a certain plasma chain which is operated by a DAPP provider, PNT seigniorage would go to the operator.
 • If there is more network effect, the more PNT usage due to the Stamina.
governanceId: • MGP Governance : if a MGP of one plasma chain is too low, a governance mechanism would be needed to modify the level of MGP. Since the network of plasma would need to be stabilized.
alternativesId:
• Current Plasma Researches. 
• But UTXO based, and no debate of gas mechanism.
issuanceId:
• Seigniorage : operator's economic incentive.
• Burn : after Exit & Challenge prize mechanism, the remained deposit is burnt.
whyId: • Plasma chain is a scalability solution itself, which is 2nd-layer blockchain of Ethereum.
incentivesId: • Using PNT, end-users don't have to pay their transaction fee with ETH.
usageId:
• Enter Deposit for Stamina Usage
• Exit & Challenge Deposit 
• Chain Deposit for open the plasma.
